event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A remote poller's connection IP address has changed
event.descr: This event is sent when a remote poller's connection IP address has changed.
event.logmsg: The connection IP address for remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% in location %parm[location]% has changed from %parm[oldConnectionHostAddress]% to %parm[newConnectionHostAddress]%.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A disconnected remote poller has reconnected
event.descr: This event is sent when a disconnected remote poller reconnects and reports status changes and checks for configuration changes.
event.logmsg: The disconnected remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% in location %parm[location]% has reconnected.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A remote poller has registered
event.descr: This event is sent by the remote poller server side API when a remote poller is created.
event.logmsg: A remote poller has registered from location %parm[location]% and been given the id: %parm[locationMonitorId]%.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A remote poller has started polling
event.descr: This event is sent when a registered remote poller begins monitoring services defined in its configuration.
event.logmsg: The remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% has started polling from location %parm[location]%.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A remote poller has been paused
event.descr:
This event is sent when a registered remote poller is configured with a polling package containing no services to poll. (experimental)
The idea here is that a webui administrator can pause a remote poller and the remote poller's configuration is changed to an empty polling package.
event.logmsg: The remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% in location %parm[location]% has been paused.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A remote poller has been shutdown.
event.descr: This event is sent when a registered remote poller is shutdown by the remote system.
event.logmsg: The remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% in location %parm[location]% has been shutdown.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined remote poller event: A remote poller has disconnected
event.descr: This event is sent when a registered remote location fails to report status and check for configuration changes at the required interval.
event.logmsg: The remote poller %parm[locationMonitorId]% in location %parm[location]% has disconnected.
